description:
A splash of colour goes a long way. This pint-sized version of the iconic Australian slip-on boot has nifty grab loops that make it easy to pull on. An extra footbed helps it fit growing feet through a growth spurt or two.

  • Durable leather upper
  • Fun, multi-coloured elastic panels are weatherproof
  • Sturdy grab loops for easy on/off
  • Extra footbed increases size range to accommodate growing feet
  • Tough polyurethane sole is non-marking
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone 1413 Kid's Boots - Children to Youths
